name: Limited Capacity - 2021 Game Jam
description:
This is a short puzzle game created as Henry Northway's entry of the University of Gloucestershire's first 2021 Game Jam.

In this challenge, we were given 24 hours to create a game from scratch under the theme of "limited capacity". This lead to the idea of fitting as many boxes onto a flatbed truck as possible, as the truck can only transport a limited amount of cargo.

Gameplay-wise, this entry shares some similarities to Tetris, in which different types of boxes (small and large) spawn at the back of the truck and slowly move forwards. A box will stop when it touches another box and a new box will spawn for the player to control. The objective is to simply keep the game running as long as possible.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Move a box vertically or laterally
  • Space Key - Accelerate a box's movement
  • Left Click - Menu navigation
